verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son אִם־ <WH518> if עָרַ֣בְתָּ <WH6148> if thou be surety לְרֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> for thy friend תָּקַ֖עְתָּ <WH8628> [if] thou hast stricken לַזָּ֣ר <WH2114> with a stranger כַּפֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH3709> thy hand

נוֹקַ֥שְׁתָּ <WH3369> Thou art snared בְאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> with the words פִ֑יךָ <WH6310> of thy mouth נִ֝לְכַּ֗דְתָּ <WH3920> thou art taken בְּאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> with the words פִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> of thy mouth

עֲשֵׂ֨ה <WH6213> Do זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise אֵפ֪וֹא ׀ <WH645> this now בְּנִ֡י <WH1121> my son וְֽהִנָּצֵ֗ל <WH5337> and deliver כִּ֘י <WH3588> Since בָ֤אתָ <WH935> thyself when thou art come בְכַף־ <WH3709> into the hand רֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> of thy friend לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> Go הִ֝תְרַפֵּ֗ס <WH7511> humble וּרְהַ֥ב <WH7292> thyself and make sure רֵעֶֽיךָ׃ <WH7453> thy friend
אַל־ <WH408> Nor תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Give שֵׁנָ֣ה <WH8142> not sleep לְעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> to thine eyes וּ֝תְנוּמָ֗ה <WH8572> nor slumber לְעַפְעַפֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH6079> to thine eyelids

הִ֭נָּצֵל <WH5337> Deliver כִּצְבִ֣י <WH6643> thyself as a roe מִיָּ֑ד <WH3027> from the hand וּ֝כְצִפּ֗וֹר <WH6833> [of the hunter] and as a bird מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> from the hand יָקֽוּשׁ׃ <WH3353> of the fowler פ לֵֽךְ־ <WH1980> along אֶל־ <WH413> to
נְמָלָ֥ה <WH5244> to the ant עָצֵ֑ל <WH6102> thou sluggard רְאֵ֖ה <WH7200> consider דְרָכֶ֣יהָ <WH1870> her ways וַחֲכָֽם׃ <WH2449> and be wise
אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> Which אֵֽין־ <WH369> having לָ֥הּ קָצִ֗ין <WH7101> Which having no guide שֹׁטֵ֥ר <WH7860> overseer וּמֹשֵֽׁל׃ <WH4910> or ruler
תָּכִ֣ין <WH3559> Provideth בַּקַּ֣יִץ <WH7019> in the summer לַחְמָ֑הּ <WH3899> her meat אָגְרָ֥ה <WH103> [and] gathereth בַ֝קָּצִ֗יר <WH7105> in the harvest מַאֲכָלָֽהּ׃ <WH3978> her food
עַד־ <WH5704> long מָתַ֖י <WH4970> How עָצֵ֥ל ׀ <WH6102> slothful תִּשְׁכָּ֑ב <WH7901> How long wilt thou sleep מָ֝תַ֗י <WH4970> How תָּק֥וּם <WH6965> arise מִשְּׁנָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8142> sleep

מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> [Yet] a little שֵׁ֭נוֹת <WH8142> sleep מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> a little תְּנוּמ֑וֹת <WH8572> slumber מְעַ֓ט ׀ <WH4592> a little חִבֻּ֖ק <WH2264> folding יָדַ֣יִם <WH3027> of the hands לִשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH7901> to sleep
וּבָֽא־ <WH935> come כִמְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> as one that travelleth רֵאשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH7389> So shall thy poverty וּ֝מַחְסֹֽרְךָ֗ <WH4270> and thy want כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man מָגֵֽן׃ <WH4043> as an armed פ
אָדָ֣ם <WH120> person בְּ֭לִיַּעַל <WH1100> A naughty אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אָ֑וֶן <WH205> a wicked ה֝וֹלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> walketh עִקְּשׁ֥וּת <WH6143> with a froward פֶּֽה׃ <WH6310> mouth
קֹרֵ֣ץ <WH7169> He winketh בְּ֭עֵינָיו <WH5869> with his eyes מֹלֵ֣ל <WH4448> he speaketh בְּרַגְלָ֑ו <WH7272> with his feet מֹ֝רֶ֗ה <WH3384> he teacheth בְּאֶצְבְּעֹתָֽיו׃ <WH676> with his fingers

תַּֽהְפֻּכ֨וֹת ׀ <WH8419> Frowardness בְּלִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> [is] in his heart חֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH2790> he deviseth רָ֣ע <WH7451> mischief בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all manner עֵ֑ת <WH6256> continually [מְדָנִים כ] (מִדְיָנִ֥ים <WH4066> brawling ק) יְשַׁלֵּֽחַ׃ <WH7971> he soweth

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that פִּ֭תְאֹם <WH6597> suddenly יָב֣וֹא <WH935> come אֵיד֑וֹ <WH343> Therefore shall his calamity פֶּ֥תַע <WH6621> suddenly יִ֝שָּׁבֵ֗ר <WH7665> shall he be broken וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <WH4832> without remedy פ

שֶׁשׁ־ <WH8337> These six הֵ֭נָּה <WH2007> in שָׂנֵ֣א <WH8130> hate יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [things] doth the LORD וְ֝שֶׁ֗בַע <WH7651> yea seven [תֹּועֲבֹות כ] (תֹּועֲבַ֥ת <WH8441> Tolaites ק) נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> unto him

עֵינַ֣יִם <WH5869> look רָ֭מוֹת <WH7311> A proud לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> tongue שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> a lying וְ֝יָדַ֗יִם <WH3027> and hands שֹׁפְכ֥וֹת <WH8210> that shed דָּם־ <WH1818> blood נָקִֽי׃ <WH5355> innocent

לֵ֗ב <WH3820> An heart חֹ֭רֵשׁ <WH2790> that deviseth מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> imaginations אָ֑וֶן <WH205> wicked רַגְלַ֥יִם <WH7272> feet מְ֝מַהֲר֗וֹת <WH4116> that be swift לָר֥וּץ <WH7323> in running לָֽרָעָה׃ <WH7451> to mischief

יָפִ֣יחַ <WH6315> [that] speaketh כְּ֭זָבִים <WH3577> lies עֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> A false וּמְשַׁלֵּ֥חַ <WH7971> and he that soweth מְ֝דָנִ֗ים <WH4090> discord בֵּ֣ין <WH996> among אַחִֽים׃ <WH251> among brethren פ

נְצֹ֣ר <WH5341> keep בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son מִצְוַ֣ת <WH4687> commandment אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> thy father's וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֝טֹּ֗שׁ <WH5203> and forsake תּוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> not the law אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH517> of thy mother

קָשְׁרֵ֣ם <WH7194> Bind עַל־ <WH5921> around לִבְּךָ֣ <WH3820> upon thine heart תָמִ֑יד <WH8548> them continually עָ֝נְדֵ֗ם <WH6029> [and] tie עַל־ <WH5921> around גַּרְגְּרֹתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1621> them about thy neck

בְּהִתְהַלֶּכְךָ֨ ׀ <WH1980> When thou goest תַּנְחֶ֬ה <WH5148> it shall lead אֹתָ֗ךְ <WH853> בְּֽ֭שָׁכְבְּךָ <WH7901> thee when thou sleepest תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> it shall keep עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> over וַ֝הֲקִיצ֗וֹתָ <WH6974> thee and [when] thou awakest הִ֣יא <WH1931> they תְשִׂיחֶֽךָ׃ <WH7878> it shall talk

כִּ֤י <WH3588> is a נֵ֣ר <WH5216> [is] a lamp מִ֭צְוָה <WH4687> For the commandment וְת֣וֹרָה <WH8451> and the law א֑וֹר <WH216> [is] light וְדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> [are] the way חַ֝יִּ֗ים <WH2416> of life תּוֹכְח֥וֹת <WH8433> and reproofs מוּסָֽר׃ <WH4148> of instruction
לִ֭שְׁמָרְךָ <WH8104> To keep מֵאֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> woman רָ֑ע <WH7451> thee from the evil מֵֽ֝חֶלְקַ֗ת <WH2513> from the flattery לָשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> of the tongue נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <WH5237> of a strange woman

אַל־ <WH408> Nor תַּחְמֹ֣ד <WH2530> Lust יָ֭פְיָהּ <WH3308> not after her beauty בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> in thine heart וְאַל־ <WH408> Nor תִּ֝קָּֽחֲךָ֗ <WH3947> neither let her take בְּעַפְעַפֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH6079> thee with her eyelids

כִּ֤י <WH3588> on בְעַד־ <WH1157> For by means of אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman זוֹנָ֗ה <WH2181> a whorish עַֽד־ <WH5704> against כִּכַּ֫ר <WH3603> [a man is brought] to a piece לָ֥חֶם <WH3899> of bread וְאֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> ess אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> he נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> life יְקָרָ֣ה <WH3368> for the precious תָצֽוּד׃ <WH6679> will hunt פ
הֲיַחְתֶּ֤ה <WH2846> take אִ֓ישׁ <WH376> Can a man אֵ֬שׁ <WH784> fire בְּחֵיק֑וֹ <WH2436> in his bosom וּ֝בְגָדָ֗יו <WH899> and his clothes לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִשָּׂרַֽפְנָה׃ <WH8313> not be burned

אִם־ <WH518> Or יְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <WH1980> go אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> Can one עַל־ <WH5921> on הַגֶּחָלִ֑ים <WH1513> upon hot coals וְ֝רַגְלָ֗יו <WH7272> and his feet לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִכָּוֶֽינָה׃ <WH3554> not be burned

כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> So הַ֭בָּא <WH935> So he that goeth in אֶל־ <WH413> about אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> to his neighbour's לֹ֥א <WH3808> her will not יִ֝נָּקֶ֗ה <WH5352> her shall not be innocent כָּֽל־ <WH3605> Whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> whosoever toucheth בָּֽהּ׃

לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָב֣וּזוּ <WH936> [Men] do not despise לַ֭גַּנָּב <WH1590> a thief כִּ֣י <WH3588> if יִגְנ֑וֹב <WH1589> if he steal לְמַלֵּ֥א <WH4390> to satisfy נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> his soul כִּ֣י <WH3588> when יִרְעָֽב׃ <WH7456> when he is hungry

וְ֭נִמְצָא <WH4672> But [if] he be found יְשַׁלֵּ֣ם <WH7999> he shall restore שִׁבְעָתָ֑יִם <WH7659> sevenfold אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all ה֖וֹן <WH1952> all the substance בֵּית֣וֹ <WH1004> of his house יִתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> he shall give

נֹאֵ֣ף <WH5003> [But] whoso committeth adultery אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> with a woman חֲסַר־ <WH2638> lacketh לֵ֑ב <WH3820> understanding מַֽשְׁחִ֥ית <WH7843> it destroyeth נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> his own soul ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃ <WH6213> he [that] doeth
נֶֽגַע־ <WH5061> A wound וְקָל֥וֹן <WH7036> and dishonour יִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> shall he get וְ֝חֶרְפָּת֗וֹ <WH2781> and his reproach לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִמָּחֶֽה׃ <WH4229> shall not be wiped away

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For קִנְאָ֥ה <WH7068> For jealousy חֲמַת־ <WH2534> [is] the rage גָּ֑בֶר <WH1397> of a man וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and he will not יַ֝חְמ֗וֹל <WH2550> therefore he will not spare בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day נָקָֽם׃ <WH5359> of vengeance

לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יִ֭שָּׂא <WH5375> accept פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> accept כָל־ <WH3605> any כֹּ֑פֶר <WH3724> any ransom וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יֹ֝אבֶ֗ה <WH14> neither will he rest content כִּ֣י <WH3588> though תַרְבֶּה־ <WH7235> though thou givest many שֹֽׁחַד׃ <WH7810> gifts פ
